sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './SettingsPanel.css'; const SettingsPanel = ({ gameSettings, onUpdateSettings, onClose }) => { const [localSettings, setLocalSettings] = useState({ ...gameSettings }); const [hasChanges, setHasChanges] = useState(false); const handleSettingChange = (key, value) => { setLocalSettings(prev => ({ ...prev, [key]: value })); setHasChanges(true); }; const handleSave = () => { onUpdateSettings(localSettings); setHasChanges(false); }; const handleReset = () => { setLocalSettings({ ...gameSettings }); setHasChanges(false); }; return (

⚙️ Game Settings

💰 Price System

handleSettingChange('targetSupply', parseInt(e.target.value))} min="1000" max="100000" step="1000" /> Supply level where price should be around target price
handleSettingChange('targetPrice', parseInt(e.target.value))} min="50" max="5000" step="50" /> Target price at target supply level
handleSettingChange('maxPrice', parseInt(e.target.value))} min="1000" max="50000" step="1000" /> Maximum price cap for commodities

🎮 Game Balance

handleSettingChange('startingCredits', parseInt(e.target.value))} min="10000" max="1000000" step="10000" /> Initial credits for new players
handleSettingChange('startingSupply', parseInt(e.target.value))} min="1000" max="100000" step="1000" /> Initial supply for all commodities

🏭 Factory Settings

handleSettingChange('factoryProductionTime', parseInt(e.target.value))} min="5" max="120" step="5" /> Time for factories to produce commodities

🤖 AI Settings

handleSettingChange('aiTradingInterval', parseInt(e.target.value))} min="500" max="5000" step="100" /> How often AI traders make decisions
handleSettingChange('priceUpdateInterval', parseInt(e.target.value))} min="500" max="5000" step="100" /> How often commodity prices update

📊 Current Price Formula:

Price = {localSettings.targetPrice} × ({localSettings.targetSupply} ÷ Current Supply)

With maximum cap of ₹{localSettings.maxPrice.toLocaleString()}

); }; export default SettingsPanel;
